column4: I HAVE A ATI RADEON 9250 AND WONT WORK!!! SCREEN GOES BLACK INTO A REBOOT LOOP
Does anyone have a ati radeon 9250 working with ubuntu yet
i just got banned from the debian server
i have the catalyst control center
but gues what i can never get that far
if anyone has any help tips or tricks please help me! i have a ATI RADON 9250!! wont work
well i thought it would have drivers in it
the radeon driver that comes with ubuntu supports the 9250
are you trying to run the XGL server?
put your /etc/X11/xorg.conf on a pastebin if you can
gedit /etc/X11/xorg.conf ; cut and paste to a pastebin; if you only have terminal install pastebinit
don't quote me, but for some people
probably nothing, only a config problem
there's always ssh. But, don't, anyway ;)
you backed into a good situation
